cards.Name: Cleansing Tags
cards.Rules Text: **Your Tablet size increases by 1.** If you receive a Condition from an Action you successfully Guarded, immediatly cure it. As an Action, you may discard this from your Tablet to cure up to 2 conditions.

cards.Name: Ring of Commitment
cards.Rules Text: **Your Tablet size increases by 1.** When using an Action, you may discard a card from your hand with a name matching that action to instantly use it a second time. Afterwards, you gain 2 stacks of **Fatigue**.
cards.Flavor Text: *The ring of goodwill has a long and bloody history.*

cards.Name: Power Bracelet
cards.Rules Text: All of your Physical Attack cards have +10 added to their base damage. This continues to affect them even if they temorarily change to "Absolute" attacks.
cards.Flavor Text: *The strength it provides to the wearer would allow even children to throw boulders.*

cards.Name: Mage's Cloak
cards.Rules Text: All of your Magical Attack cards have +10 added to their base damage. This continues to affect them even if they temporarily change to "Absolute" Attacks.
cards.Flavor Text: *The threads themselves were imbuded with concentrated magic before being careful woven together.*

cards.Name: Soldier's Kite
cards.Rules Text: Reduce all Physical and Magical damage you take by 10.
cards.Flavor Text: *Most recivers mock the name, but none will deny it was this handy armament that led them all home.*

cards.Name: Storage Matrix
cards.Rules Text: As an action, discard this card to reduce the cost of all actions this turn by 1 *(Minimum 0).*
cards.Flavor Text: *A complex arrangment of cubes, each holding a snall quantum of energy. If you turn it just right, it all pours out at once.*

cards.Name: Vola Tabi
cards.Rules Text: Your base movement is raised by 1.
cards.Flavor Text: *The small wings are made of feathers plucked from over 20 different creatures. Included are various birds, elementals, raptors and even angels.*

cards.Name: Calamitous Disk
cards.Rules Text: All damage you deal or take is increased by 20. Raise the result of your Crit Rolls by 1.
cards.Flavor Text: *Anyone that looks deep enough into it's voidlike core will see nothing but death and fear eternal.*

cards.Name: Riposte
cards.Rules Text: Prevent all damage and additional effects you would suffer as the result of a **Physical Attack**. In addition to this card, you must also discard another card from your hand if able.

cards.Name: Counterspell
cards.Rules Text: Prevent all damage and additional effects you would suffer as teh result of a **Magical Attack**. In addition to this card, you must also discard another card from your hand if able.

cards.Name: Backstep
cards.Rules Text: Prevent all damage and additional effects you would suffer as the result of a **Melee Attack**. Afterwards, move 1 space away from the attacker if possible. Reduce your AP by 1.

cards.Name: Doge Roll
cards.Rules Text: Prevent all damage and additional effects you would suffer as the result of a **Ranged Attack**. Afterwards, move 1 space towards the attacker if possible. Reduce your AP by 1.

cards.Name: Keen Awareness
cards.Rules Text: Prevent all effects from a **Sabotage Action** that targets you. The opponent must discard that action if they otherwise wouldn't. In addition to this card, you must also discard another card from your hand if able.

cards.Name: Peace of Mind
cards.Rules Text: If you discarded any number of cards this turn, shuffle any number of those cards back into your deck. Suffle your hand back into your deck, then draw 1 card.

cards.Name: Negate
cards.Rules Text: You Gaurd this attack if able. The opponent must discard that action if tehy otherwise wouldn't. You gain 1 stack of Fatigue and have 1 fewer AP on your next turn.

cards.Name: Death Roulette
cards.Rules Text: Your opponent Crits this attack and you do not Gaurd. Then, prevent 30 damage from this attack *(or all if less)* and choose a character at random. The chosen character takes the damage that was prevented this way. If the attack has additional effects, they only affect your character.

cards.Name: Agile Maneuver
cards.Rules Text: **This attack cannot Crit.** Move onto a free space adjacent to the target *(if none exist stay in place)*.
cards.Empowered Text: Damage +10.
cards.Flavor Text: *"We each have our strengths. I tend to disregard gravity."*

cards.Name: Ambush
cards.Rules Text: Can only target a character that didn't target you on their turn. Target doesn't make a Guard Roll.
cards.Empowered Text: Target also discards a card.

cards.Name: Apocalypse
cards.Rules Text: **X is the remainder of your AP.** Discard your hand and your Action Tablet. Draw cards equal to the amount discarded, up to 4. You may then put any Action or Equipment with a Star Level of 4 or less onto your Action Tablet.
cards.Flavor Text: *"Evrything I was, everything I knew...it was a lie."*

cards.Name: Arcane Boomerang
cards.Rules Text: **On hit, return this card to your hand.** Can target through obstacles.
cards.Empowered Text: **Crit Rate +2.** On crit, refunds 1 AP for this turn.
cards.Flavor Text: *Don't throw unless you're ready to catch.*

cards.Name: Astral Guidance
cards.Rules Text: Search your deck for any one card of your choice, then shuffle your deck and place the chosen card on top. **Either discard after use OR reduce your AP by 1.**
cards.Empowered Text: You may instead put the chosen card in your hand, but you will then have to discard a card.

cards.Name: Backstab
cards.Rules Text: Can only target a character who didn't target you on their last turn. Opponent cannot react to this Action.
cards.Empowered Text: Choose one: Target gains a stack of Fatigue, OR cure all positive conditions on them, OR they can only use one action from their Action Tablet next turn.

cards.Name: Bear Trap
cards.Rules Text: Place a Bear Trap on the targeted empty space. When a character stands on it, remove the trap and they lose 10 health. They also lose 2 movement points if it's their turn.
cards.Empowered Text: Whenever a player steps on a Bear Trap, they must show you a card in their hand at random.

cards.Name: Blind Faith
cards.Rules Text: If you are blinded, **Crit Rate +2** and on Crit increase your AP by 1.
cards.Empowered Text: You may inflict the "Blinded" status on yourself before making the Crit Roll.
cards.Flavor Text: *"You may doubt your eyes, but never doubt your heart."*

cards.Name: Challenge
cards.Rules Text: Until your next turn, target character cannot directly target anyone other than you. If they don't target you with any Attack actions, they must discard a card from their Tablet. If they successfully crit you with an action, **discard this card**.
cards.Empowered Text: The first time you guard one of that player's actions next turn, they must discard it.

cards.Name: Coated Blade
cards.Rules Text: **Crit Rate +1**. On Crit, inflicts the **"Poisoned"** Condition.
cards.Empowered Text: Choose One: Target also has 1 fewer AP next turn OR **Crit Rate +4** instead of **+1**.
cards.Flavor Text: *For best results, we recommend placing under the skin.*

cards.Name: Continuous Assault
cards.Rules Text: Damage +10 if target is ***Exausted***. Damage +10 if the target has a Hunter's Mark.
cards.Empowered Text: If target had any stacks of Fatigue or a Hunter's Mark, they gain a **"Disruption"** condition. If not, they gain a stack of Fatigue, plus a Hunter's Mark if you are the **Hunter**.

cards.Name: Crafty Negotiation
cards.Rules Text: Can only target a character you haven't damaged this turn. Opponent makes a Guard Roll. If they succeed the Gaurd Roll, nothing happens. If they fail, you and the other player may not directly each other until your next turn. In either case, **discard after use**.
cards.Empowered Text: If target succeeds the Guard Roll, reduce their AP by 1.

cards.Name: Crippling Strike
cards.Rules Text: Target has 1 fewwe movement and 2 fewer AP next turn.
cards.Empowered Text: **Crit Rate +1** On Crit, inflicts the **"Disruption"** status.
cards.Flavor Text: *"Fighters and champions we may be, but we still bleed like people."*

cards.Name: Crucible
cards.Rules Text: Cure all non-Burning conditions. Then gain the "Burning" condition.
cards.Empowered Text: Any character adjacent to you loses 10 health, plus another 10 for each condition you cured.
cards.Flavor Text: *"Belive in the fire. Let it cleanse your impurities."*

cards.Name: Cutpurse
cards.Rules Text: Target discards their hand and 2 cards from the top of their deck. If any Reaction cards are discarded from their hand, they may get them back into their hand. **Discard this card after use**
cards.Empowered Text: For each Equipment or Reaction that was discarded, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Deadly Slash
cards.Empowered Text: On Crit, deals +20 damage instead of +10. Ignores opponet's Equipment reductions.
cards.Flavor Text: *"I mean, if you swing hard enough..."*

cards.Name: Drastic Measure
cards.Rules Text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you find a number of unique Action cards equal to the number of Actions on your Tablet Actions *(not Equipment)* and replace them with the new ones. Finally, shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.
cards.Empowered Text: After use, refunds 1 AP this turn.

cards.Name: Dream Slip
cards.Rules Text: If a target does not have the most Fatigue among all other characters, they gain up to 4 stacks of Fatigue, stopping once they are tied for most. If they do have the most, they gain 1 stack of Fatigue.
cards.Empowered Text: Reduce target's AP by 1. This effect cannot occur multiple turns in a row.

cards.Name: Dust Bomb
cards.Rules Text: Inflicts the "Disruption" condition. **Discard after use.**
cards.Empowered Text: Target also gains 1 stack of Fatigue.

cards.Name: Empathic Link
cards.Rules Text: You look at target's hand and they look at yours. You may place up to one action card from the other person's hand onto your Action Tablet *(turn sideways to establish it's the opponent's card).* After a sideways action is used once, return it to its owner's hand. **Discard this card after use.**
cards.Empowered Text: Give your conditions to the opponent.

cards.Name: Enigma Blast
cards.Rules Text: If opponent has any actions on their Tablet with an AP cost of 1 or fewer, choose one for them to discard *(X is considered 0)*. If this attack is guarded, **discard this card**.
cards.Empowered Text: You man reduce your AP by one to instead choose a card with an AP cost of 2.
